attributes.action: Publically acknowledge 9/11 as an inside Job and request that the USA get a public inquiry.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A brief view of the evidence of Government involvement in 911 shows something very fishy going on. 
Building 7 - a huge 46 story (not hit by any aircraft and suffered minor damage) falls down in under 6 seconds in the middle of the afternoon. 
The WTC towers fall in under 10 seconds (free-fall speed!!!). Explosions were reported in the buildings and even video evidence shows this. 
911 started the war on terrorism - but the terrorists were the US government!!
Iraq, Afghanistan and maybe Iraq are phoney wars on the back of 911. Admit the truth and seperate the UK from any involvement.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
